mapper.insert: insert into REPLY(reply_id, reply_content, reply_writer, reply_date, board_id) values (REPLY_ID_UP.nextval,#{replyContent},#{replyWriter},#{replyDate},#{boardId})
mapper.select: select * from REPLY order by REPLY_ID desc
select reply_id as replyId, reply_content as replyContent, reply_writer as replyWriter, reply_date as replyDate, board_id as boardId from REPLY where BOARD_ID = #{boardId} order by REPLY_ID desc
